mapper.select: SELECT PORTFOLIO_ID AS portfolioId, PORTFOLIO_TITLE AS title FROM portfolio_tb WHERE STUDENT_ID=#{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portfolio_tb (PORTFOLIO_TITLE, PORTFOLIO_DATE, STUDENT_ID) VALUES (#{portfoilioId}, ${createDate}, #{userId});
mapper.select: SELECT ACT.ACT_ID AS activityId, ACT.ACT_TITLE AS title, ACT.ACT_STITLE AS subTitle, ACT.ACT_CONTENT AS contents, ACT.ACT_TYPENAME AS activityType, ACT_CT.ACT_COMPLETED_SDATE AS startDay, ACT_CT.ACT_COMPLETED_FDATE AS endDay, ACT_CT.ACT_IS_COMPLETED AS completed FROM portfolio_completed_tb AS PRC JOIN activity_tb AS ACT ON PRC.ACT_ID = ACT.ACT_ID JOIN activity_progress_completed_tb AS ACT_CT ON ACT_CT.ACT_ID = ACT.ACT_ID WHERE PRC.PORTFOLIO_ID=#{portfolioId};
